alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 06 at 8:28AM AKDT until October 07 at 3:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Fairbanks and the surrounding areas. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A snow band has set up over Fairbanks and will continue to produce an additional 1 to 2 inches of snowfall for most locations, and up to 3 inches on higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on the higher terrain of the Steese and Elliott Highways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
